intro: The legendary dirt racing sim is back and bigger than ever. If you're looking for old school dirt racing fun mixed in with cutting edge tech, then this is the game for you!
description:
Dirt Trackin’ 3 redefines the standard for future iterations of the genre bringing you old school dirt racing fun mixed in with cutting edge tech!

Features:
- 27 meticulously crafted realistic tracks which include officially licensed tracks, re-imagined DT series favorites as well as completely brand new ones.
- 5 Real-World classes: Super Late Models, Crate Late Models, Modifieds, B-Mods and Street Stocks.
- Over 100 approved real-world drivers to choose from.

Improved Physics:
- Feel the track come alive as grip variations change with the day: best for Time Trials, moderate for Heat races, and slowest for Mains.
- Game modes including Hotlaps with Ghost support, Single Races and full-on Race Weekends.

Customisation:
- A free-ranged tool that allows you the design your car like never before.
- Huge selection of Real-World Sponsor logos, wraps and decals available.
- Paint any part you want, place any logo/number anywhere on the car.
- Wraps and decals from some of the most popular graphic designers in motorsports.

Fully-fledged Career Mode:
- Start with Street Stock and grow your team to make your way to the top SLM seasons.
- Use the cash from your race earnings to improve the performance of your car with various upgrades.
- Sign with different sponsors and complete their objectives to earn more money.
- Hire crew members to boost your team’s performance.
- Unlock cool customisations as you go.
- Fans love a driver who bangs the boards. Run the high side for a bonus on your merch sales!

Multiplayer:
- Up to 20 simultaneous players.
- Reworked framework for better stability.

Race Replays:
- Want to relive your races from different angles? The replay system’s got you covered!
- You can watch from inside the car, on the car, or even from static cameras to catch all the action.
- Use the director mode to sit back and watch all the action with curated highlights.
- If you’re feeling fancy, you can even watch from TV-style cameras!

Controls and car setups:
- Choose from various controls and assist levels to tune your car.
- Fine-tune your car's parameters and input methods to match your preferred driving style.

And much more!
